overview: Hashar is the story of today’s young generation who without true feelings of love, get together and later due to misunderstandings their life becomes tumultuous.Set in university campus it highlights the fact that when supported by politicians for their own benefits, student politics can take an ugly turn and create havoc in the personal life of students.The story is all about love, passion, hatred and romance and above all this fiction is more than reality.
title: Hashar - A Love Story
